item.title: Mercedes Benz Actros Euro 6 v1.0 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 3, 2025

Mercedes Benz Actros Euro 6 v1.0 1.55 ETS2

Version 1.0:
– Worked and tested for the 1.55 game version

Features:
– 2 Cabin Options
– 2 Chassis Options
– 7 Engine Options
– 8 Transmission Options
– 2 Steering Wheel Options
– Paintjob Options
– Many Tuning Options

Credits: Monteiro

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania Streamline Series 5 v3.4 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 3, 2025

Scania Streamline Series 5 v3.4 1.55 ETS2

Version 3.4:
– Worked and tested for the 1.55 game version

Features:
– 3 Cabin Options
– 3 Chassis Options
– 8 Engine Options
– 7 Transmission Options
– 2 Interior Options
– 5 Steering Wheel Options
– 2 Skin Options
– Paintjob Options
– Many Tuning Options

Credits: Quality3D

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mack Superliner v2.7.1 1.55 – 1.56 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 3, 2025

Mack Superliner v2.7.1 1.55 – 1.56 ATS

Features:
– 8 Cabins
– 6 Chassis
– 2 Interiors
– 14 Engines
– 77 transmissions
– A hand-made sleeper.
– A new interior type and a new color scheme
– Many customizations for the new sleeper cab
-T ons of new lights, horns, mudflaps and improvements
– 2 new paintjobs and all existing ones added sleeper variation
– A separate pack for interior accessories and SiSL’s compatibility.
– Superlienr I and II generations in one package
– highly detailed 80s era tri axle configuration
– new full gauges animated dashboard interior
– customizations for work truck/show truck looks, including retro to modern parts
– even more options for red nodes hook-ups, search “vd” for rear lights, mud flaps, plates and more.
– Many hand-made paint jobs, including Mack limited edition skins.

Changelog
Compability update for 1.55, 1.56

Credits: 3D Model, texture: DielingWu, Harven Sound: Kriechbaum Engine/Transmission: Fury6, Harven, Kriechbaum Skin: DielingWu, Goggles56

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania T580 Klemmensen + Trailer v7.0 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 3, 2025

Scania T580 Klemmensen + Trailer v7.0 1.55 ETS2

Include:
– Topline cab
– 6×2 midlift chassis
– DC16 E3 Openpipe sounds
– Opticruise GRS 905R transmission
– Full Standalone
– Full Lightmask
– Full animation
– RED interior light as accessory
– Support SiSL’s Mega Pack
– Personal wheels
– Has interior tuning
– Truck is adapted for version 1.55

Credits: PDT

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Skins Pack v1.3 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | September 3, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Skins Pack v1.3 ATS

The Kenworth Skins pack is been built by The Godfather’s Mods Company and covers over Modded Kenworth Trucks in American Truck Simulator for the T909 / T908 RTA / T609 RTA / T610GTM / T680 SCS Software Truck & T680 Next Gen SCS Software Truck

v1.0 (Release Edition)
The Launch edition has a bunch of skins over a wide range of T Series Kenworth Trucks

v1.1 Update (May 2025)
This Update Adds the 1st wave of Kenworth T408SAR & T409SAR Skins Plus the Return of some T908 RTA Skins & new skins for the T909 / T609 & T610GTM Trucks also updated to the pack to work with the 1.54 ATS Update also the T680 Next Gen skins have been removed due to me losing the XML File for the T680 Next Gen truck also all T609RTA Skins have been removed due to mod studio 2 update screwing the way they do skinning.

v1.2 Update (July 2025)
This Update Brings 24 New Skins to the pack and also is updated for ATS v1.55

v1.3 Update (September 3rd 2025)
This Update brings a whole new wave of Skins to the pack with also our 1st wave of Kenworth T610SAR Skins & Kenworth T659 Skins to the pack so we have in this update 7 new T909 Skins , 4 new T908 RTA Skins , 1 new T610GTM Skin , 3 T659 Skins & 5 T610SAR Skins with a grand total of 20 brand new skins to the pack to bring the pack up to a grand total of 242 Kenworth Skins in the pack.

Skins that are in this mod pack are listed below

Kenworth T909 Skins
